title: Aquarium
brief_description: Brilliantly photographed non-narrated tableau of unusual underwater creatures including fish that walk on their ‘hands’, sea horses and octopus. Explores the feeding habits and methods of locomotion of these marine life forms. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
